document.title: Faith Formation (Religion) Curriculum Framework Standards and Benchmarks: Grade 1

A69F3338FF0D473D8A1248D8E04595BF.description: Students will know that creation is a gift from God.

CDA3F21629404EB4805475204259F194.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the importance of care for God’s creation.

50FB1B2AE3B8457893899CA0B1993F9E.description: Students will know that we share in the joys and pains of others.

3A61F31E74EC4981893346923B489BC7.description: Students will know that Jesus wants us all to be one.

495E6ECC881144B3BB5E97968DC16B15.description: Students will grow in their understanding of solidarity.

3254E4FC96F84ECF8BA453D86E415290.description: Students will know to appreciate the roles and responsibilities of each family member.

5AF8C19B7A084A72B99E9EA5D869A0CA.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the dignity of the work and the rights of others.

88768A032C034942B8240A621F02A449.description: Students will know that we must show by our action Jesus’ special love for the poor.

20D140117ACB4098B917C12C0A94B559.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the preferential option for the poor and vulnerable.

8DF807D7534D42BC87F2636B26F4B7F0.description: Students will know it is wrong to take another’s property.

FE97733D0C944598B806DDD4D28C4E8D.description: Students will know that we respect other people’s property.

92E4D5A57CFB45D498C13E3BC3AAC2D8.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the rights of all people and their responsibilities towards others.

607B80FCBF774863A035E6383B12CBAD.description: Students will know that we are called to obey the law of our community.

58DD16FD26124F61A0F301FAC056A9CC.description: Students will know that we honor our family members with respect and obedience.

08409DEDF90F43F4B917FC0B61A5F970.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the call to family, community and participation in society.

42B31ABEA18D44B19D7A5687F61534A3.description: Students will know that the dignity of the human person comes from being created in God’s image and likeness.

EB34A32C46D64DD9839AC90D57AD94EA.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the life and dignity of the human person.

B8CFD60949F84309A36B363544FE0E9B.description: Students will know some ways that we can serve others and do acts of justice.

B77A455299DC433582CF1A2E7753B7DC.description: Students will grow in their understanding of justice and service.

36DDD0922B33439695E23107A194F1C1.description: Students will know how to develop good habits.

5284551E38AF4919A6F7DA19EF9DDD8F.description: Students will know that God’s family includes peoples of all races, languages, and abilities.

8A7C3F260ABC4C4F8928FC379E8B9D80.description: Students will grow in their knowledge of Catholic social teaching.

A74712593799425683A49EFAB60898D3.description: Students will recognize people working in different ministries of the Church.

FD1038C1DE22463B9475332CB4FAFA3F.description: Students will know the names of some ministries in the Church.

23AB868F8A1D4F80845A19634E173871.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in the ministry of the Church.

49CA64EE8DCF4912A475ACA5CD912F4C.description: Students will know the name of their parish and the meaning of this name.

AA73C90EF8C64818A847743FAB94BD6D.description: Students will know the name of the Pope.

FD9D2B58F3E5434492C43E28A093F7C1.description: Students will know the name of the Bishop of Orlando.

4F1E67524FB84E7596D2D2F34053570E.description: Students will know the name of the pastor and be introduced to him.

FA6E8F62D13B4A9D8249ABDACE2261D8.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Church life at parish, diocesan and universal levels.

73852E67FF0B43E08493DD2F662D142E.description: Students will know that Jesus wants us to always grow in our faith.

F651990788AD4B6083E400D575074E64.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in life-long faith formation.

AA576813846F4D6EB445310889A22E02.description: Students will know that it is wrong to miss Mass on Sunday.

943CD1B7EC874F87B8884A431AA53F63.description: Students will know that we worship together as Church on Sunday.

6045094EE372444990613DAE68EB9200.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in the liturgical life of the Church.

2F757136DDE746E1915180F9AAFCAAD0.description: Students will know that Church law helps us to do good and avoid evil.

3D46F28C4015403C8947CA44541D3BF3.description: Students will know that Jesus wants us to obey his teachings.

D0C216B8BA1644F28CFB46625D91C4D9.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Church Law.

119185446D4B4438987B39B614623F7E.description: Students will know that God always loves us and forgives us.

69E72F51A1B04260A2524B96426F0E38.description: Students will know that when we hurt someone we must say we are sorry.

F69E82A898214DA8A5CCF3F62B13043E.description: Students will know to say “I’m sorry” when we hurt someone.

D0598D1D534F4C84997092A174B6AA42.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Sin and Forgiveness.

BE33B1D68BFB434587AD3B72B2AC2D3F.description: Students will know that we must listen to what God tells us.

A72BA903C0D2402790F30CAB99775401.description: Students will know that Jesus wants us to be like him.

07D6845CA75A4B12A693A337F7B53AA4.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Conscience.

1ED2B473BBED4DD3A519823988860437.description: Students will know that it is important to tell the truth.

35023139FDDC4D41A33813BB4F0147BE.description: Students will know that we must respect the property of others.

8021FC29E0D14829B50C782240ECB679.description: Students will know that God’s name is holy.

CD35CE40127E45BEB43398AC042ED006.description: Students will know that we must love God our Father more than anything.

87E8E570A703421895939755962E8CF1.description: Students will know the story of Moses and the Ten Commandments.

E72935BC5A854E75A44EBCACEA485D61.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Commandments.

EC2E8E35EB004B89B93607932FEFD818.description: Students will know the meaning of the word “beatitude.”

36129725821243AB8317E2882B609097.description: Students will know the story of the Sermon on the Mount and its meaning for us.

A0759DCC17764FD9BDD20494610A4C21.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Beatitudes.

862B5C18728043A1BB71EC06F9E85496.description: Students will know that we show our love by good words and actions.

2F28228F8C1F48E48780A60BD148AAC0.description: Students will know that Jesus wants us to love and respect others.

9EE5D98ADE034AE1BA3233F4056763C9.description: Students will know that God wants us to obey our parents and teachers.

3BE1BCD731B748FA99E3AF78EB32B92A.description: Students will know that Jesus teaches us to be good.

ED257EB7A04F477698F8C940CFC19764.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Life in Christ.

5B9E60F78A3D40DA9F567F1728B4F15B.description: Students will know that vocal prayer joins the prayer of the body to the prayer of the heart.

23699A9E7EDA4A098EFDB1F8AB40A1A8.description: Students will learn to pray the Hail Mary.

C417FAFB6B5948BB94A608BD146CD678.description: Students will know that when we pray we talk to God.

8AA4DFC5C2B94C429591F686014741D4.description: Students will grow in their understanding of prayer.

6503427573254726ADCF397F4FC3CD44.description: Students will know that Jesus is present in the tabernacle.

B5984C15D9464C089ED611BE44AB18C3.description: Students will know how to pray some psalms.

52F96FFC883241B794CD7C1C1FB40572.description: Students will know some of the blessings of the Church, such as the Blessing for a birthday.

28B6AFCA775845EF881C01AB64BCBD5A.description: Students will grow in their understanding of other Liturgical celebrations.

598A89D6CE3B47DB811EA3187F1E2089.description: Students will know the importance of Sunday.

D4F129C85A9E49B18CC29319512B1B3F.description: Students will know the colors of the liturgical seasons.

3DCE373A9F784D00A0EE45C6E9ED249D.description: Students will know the names of the liturgical seasons.

3A642C8E1D034856869D174D4FF2BABA.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Liturgical Year.

BB298917ED0F4C34A73DA27C24ACF198.description: Students will know the meaning of liturgical gestures we use at Mass.

FF17CC82FFDF4DA4B5D0E80F6230DD35.description: Students will know the meaning of sacred space.

76A5E895B9424AEBB532E299A14B44B4.description: Students will know that when we hurt one another we must say we are sorry.

F9800875C3E5418DB3C5ED57E7FF0FD7.description: Students will know that Bread and wine are signs of God’s life and love in the Eucharist.

D222EEC2366F404FAC159F79D0A61488.description: Students will know that water is a sign of new life in Baptism.

D0F67065721048B9A4C9AF69E605AD62.description: Students will know that God gave us signs of his love called sacraments.

C7DF822806974283914BA8E9CC445FC8.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Sacraments.

3AC0695619EC46698C66524601344C4D.description: Students will know that we pray before meals and at bedtime.

B46D14BD0BEA4B77B515F2391F5B4E61.description: Students will know that Baptism makes us members of God’s family.

9C59006E8D344A389521038B8E663B5A.description: Students will know that we participate at Mass every Sunday.

C4E4F893204845B69FF5092D1710194A.description: Students will know the Our Father and Glory be to the Father.

F42D0740C1A5455F98481BE3B34ADA95.description: Students will know how to make the Sign of the Cross.

C5951A27B5154BFCB53D6BDBFC4E55B0.description: Students will know we begin our prayer with the Sign of the Cross.

DA13D40D159944B7A03034A011B3D671.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Worship and prayer.

955A2E54F8734485954F1CE9E078687F.description: Students will know the names and stories of some saints.

2D494EFDC8D24412BA0E8CE75A919C7B.description: Students will know that the saints in heaven pray for us.

7E7610E845B04EC1B2E40103F94E2474.description: Students will know that the saints are in heaven and belong to God’s family.

774D45BF83E5498ABF6F80BDF9F8BD3D.description: Students will know that Mary is our mother.

28622B5682F743A98BF5C16982F7E49B.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Saints.

F7F14425BE62476BB19C21401E27F321.description: Students will know the story of creation.

71D20A0D080C4EAF8D2BB2BC65ADB59E.description: Students will know that in the Bible God tells us about himself.

093B0EB7BB274191A7131A1CC43C8B02.description: Students will know that God is the creator of all things.

24174E3E13CB415E8D2DA8CA5200A0F7.description: Students will know that the Bible is God’s special book.

B8139587E8C74347930F9783ED7CEE75.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Revelation.

1EEC8255E67B4DD983B2FF8E56085102.description: Students will know that God saves us, not as individuals, but as members of a family.

5A1817E6C89C40D38929DCF7AB9F19C5.description: Students will know that Baptism makes them a member of God’s family, the Church.

560726BDAD0647D2A7E34C9D8637F78C.description: Students will know that we pray together every Sunday as God’s family.

9B1654EF2A4F4C66A8BA1F11A3E17CDF.description: Students will know that the Church is God’s family and is made up of people who follow him.

6679E603C94A40D69A88A1ACEA346353.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Church.

5FAC7F3ACE9D42989E2BE597CD14DEBD.description: Students will know that the Holy Spirit is the expression of God’s love for us.

0BD80D6F7C5F4EAC9DA544D9FC51B0E3.description: Students will know that Jesus sent the Holy Spirit to guide us and to live holy lives.

7DE0A069C5754BB39F56BF567B8FEB2D.description: Students will know that the Holy Spirit lives in the whole world.

DF78C051447048038EFC79C1DD5A5DF6.description: Students will know that the Holy Spirit is the third person of the Trinity.

39F369512844455D9FCFB7D614B11481.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Holy Spirit.

CF75EC5FF96E43E09B14180F7CFFD4DA.description: Students will know about the most important commandment given to us by Jesus.

D81B43CF5A534A7C9C76BC4D09E37BFA.description: Students will know that Jesus’ followers are called Christians.

BF04053847BC43D0907535F7EB3DF39F.description: Students will know that the Holy Family consists of Joseph, Mary and the child Jesus.

FF8CEC2CEC684F69BAEA2261AF238F9C.description: Students will know that Mary is the mother of Jesus and is our mother.

F53C77B933D848549F5B71D3B55765A1.description: Students will know that Jesus helps us to know God’s love for us.

B90BAAA3BC8949F59F5DEB0E744D099A.description: Students will know that Jesus healed the sick.

81E751F7EBD9430B90112F38A6D47249.description: Students will know that Jesus is the Son of God.

0C5399EB979B416B8AEC206FD5E1059C.description: Students will grow in their understanding of God the Son.

7C10F6646C524AA682B12C10B05885C0.description: Students will know that God takes care of all that he has made.

F6645998320B48EEB39BB8E227A063C2.description: Students will know that God is the creator of all things.

9A979664B0B04A9E81E4851ABBAD8A87.description: Students will know that God is our Father.

8686709EFB8B4D13BA7F0EFF15C1DE3F.description: Students will grow in their understanding of God the Father.

21D677CC405D4EC8B6B6C8A206DD95A8.description: Students will know that God made us to be happy with him in heaven.

137B7DDB7A13412B9679C886A1B49ABB.description: Students will know that we are created in God’s image.

4C786BE5964D45BDBD5785039EAFA27C.description: Students will know the three persons in one God: Father, Son and Holy Spirit.

5BB3D36C4B614B489F0CCC6A7DB8A813.description: Students will know that God loves them.

6C0C82ECC1FE4BBF86DEABBBD3FF174D.description: Students will know that God is love.

A849C10C2A4645ED9B7C4816E52ED05E.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Triune God.
